org.sonatype.aether.util.filter

Class AndDependencyFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sonatype.aether.util.filter.AndDependencyFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DependencyFilter

    public class AndDependencyFilter
extends Object
implements DependencyFilter
    A dependency filter that combines zero or more other filters using a logical AND.
    Author:
    Benjamin Bentmann
